long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension makes it easier to track Github PRs by having a single place to look at PRs that need your review, PRs that have changes requested and your PRs.

All you need to do to use this is:
* Install the Chrome extension
* Create a GitHub personal access token with the repo permission
* Enter the token into the extension
* Enjoy

It's built on top of the Chrome extension PR Monitor: https://chromewebstore.google.com/detail/pr-monitor/pneldbfhblmldbhmkolclpkijgnjcmng
